name: Among You Online Edition
description:
Among You is a single-player detective game where you must go around the map, trying to figure out who the impostor is.

FOR BEST QUALITY, GO FULLSCREEN WASD or arrow keys to move. Mobile friendly! Go around the map and find clues , bodies and do task. There are 2 ways to win : do all the task or voted out the imposter. There are 2 ways to be defeat , too. The ways are : voted out crewmate or the imposter cought you. If you touch a trap , you can't move for 2-4 seconds. When you are near a clue, the search button lights up. You can turn on the lights for one room at a time to stop the impostor from coming. (You cannot turn on the lights of more than one room at the same time. Lights turn off after 10 seconds, then you must wait 10 seconds before turning them on again. When you are ready, go back to report , do task and vote out the crewmate with no evidence. You have unlimited meetings and can skip if you don't have enough evidence. Don't let the impostor catch you! IMPORTANT TIPS: - Don't corner yourself. - Turning on the lights will make the impostor disappear. Use this to your advantage. - When you hear the sharp creak sound, it may mean that the impostor is out of the vents. RUN!!! - When you hear the impostor crawling in the vents, it means he is getting ready to jump out. - Each crewmate has one piece of evidence. The impostor has none. - If the impostor is chasing you, hitting the emergency button will reset his cooldown.
